argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | pmod.a | |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) |
| 2 |  | pmod.s | |- S = ( PSubSp ` K ) |
| 3 |  | pmod.p | |- .+ = ( +P ` K ) |
| 4 |  | #P_incom | |- ( X i^i ( ( X i^i Z ) .+ Y ) ) = ( ( ( X i^i Z ) .+ Y ) i^i X ) |
| 5 |  | #P_hllat | |- ( K e. HL -> K e. Lat ) |
| 6 | 5 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( K e. HL /\ ( X e. S /\ Y C_ A /\ Z C_ A ) ) -> K e. Lat ) |
| 7 |  | #P_simpr2 | |- ( ( K e. HL /\ ( X e. S /\ Y C_ A /\ Z C_ A ) ) -> Y C_ A ) |
| 8 |  | #P_inss2 | |- ( X i^i Z ) C_ Z |
| 9 |  | #P_simpr3 | |- ( ( K e. HL /\ ( X e. S /\ Y C_ A /\ Z C_ A ) ) -> Z C_ A ) |
| 10 | 8, 9 | #P_syl5ss | |- ( ( K e. HL /\ ( X e. S /\ Y C_ A /\ Z C_ A ) ) -> ( X i^i Z ) C_ A ) |
| 11 | 1, 3 | #P_paddcom | |- ( ( K e. Lat /\ Y C_ A /\ ( X i^i Z ) C_ A ) -> ( Y .+ ( X i^i Z ) ) = ( ( X i^i Z ) .+ Y ) ) |
| 12 | 6, 7, 10, 11 | #P_syl3anc | |- ( ( K e. HL /\ ( X e. S /\ Y C_ A /\ Z C_ A ) ) -> ( Y .+ ( X i^i Z ) ) = ( ( X i^i Z ) .+ Y ) ) |
| 13 | 12 | #P_ineq2d | |- ( ( K e. HL /\ ( X e. S /\ Y C_ A /\ Z C_ A ) ) -> ( X i^i ( Y .+ ( X i^i Z ) ) ) = ( X i^i ( ( X i^i Z ) .+ Y ) ) ) |
| 14 |  | #P_incom | |- ( X i^i Y ) = ( Y i^i X ) |
| 15 | 14 | #P_oveq2i | |- ( ( X i^i Z ) .+ ( X i^i Y ) ) = ( ( X i^i Z ) .+ ( Y i^i X ) ) |
| 16 |  | #P_inss2 | |- ( X i^i Y ) C_ Y |
| 17 | 16, 7 | #P_syl5ss | |- ( ( K e. HL /\ ( X e. S /\ Y C_ A /\ Z C_ A ) ) -> ( X i^i Y ) C_ A ) |
| 18 | 1, 3 | #P_paddcom | |- ( ( K e. Lat /\ ( X i^i Y ) C_ A /\ ( X i^i Z ) C_ A ) -> ( ( X i^i Y ) .+ ( X i^i Z ) ) = ( ( X i^i Z ) .+ ( X i^i Y ) ) ) |
| 19 | 6, 17, 10, 18 | #P_syl3anc | |- ( ( K e. HL /\ ( X e. S /\ Y C_ A /\ Z C_ A ) ) -> ( ( X i^i Y ) .+ ( X i^i Z ) ) = ( ( X i^i Z ) .+ ( X i^i Y ) ) ) |
| 20 |  | #P_simpr1 | |- ( ( K e. HL /\ ( X e. S /\ Y C_ A /\ Z C_ A ) ) -> X e. S ) |
| 21 | 10, 7, 20 | #P_3jca | |- ( ( K e. HL /\ ( X e. S /\ Y C_ A /\ Z C_ A ) ) -> ( ( X i^i Z ) C_ A /\ Y C_ A /\ X e. S ) ) |
| 22 |  | #P_inss1 | |- ( X i^i Z ) C_ X |
| 23 | 1, 2, 3 | #P_pmod1i | |- ( ( K e. HL /\ ( ( X i^i Z ) C_ A /\ Y C_ A /\ X e. S ) ) -> ( ( X i^i Z ) C_ X -> ( ( ( X i^i Z ) .+ Y ) i^i X ) = ( ( X i^i Z ) .+ ( Y i^i X ) ) ) ) |
| 24 | 22, 23 | #P_mpi | |- ( ( K e. HL /\ ( ( X i^i Z ) C_ A /\ Y C_ A /\ X e. S ) ) -> ( ( ( X i^i Z ) .+ Y ) i^i X ) = ( ( X i^i Z ) .+ ( Y i^i X ) ) ) |
| 25 | 21, 24 | #P_syldan | |- ( ( K e. HL /\ ( X e. S /\ Y C_ A /\ Z C_ A ) ) -> ( ( ( X i^i Z ) .+ Y ) i^i X ) = ( ( X i^i Z ) .+ ( Y i^i X ) ) ) |
| 26 | 15, 19, 25 | #P_3eqtr4a | |- ( ( K e. HL /\ ( X e. S /\ Y C_ A /\ Z C_ A ) ) -> ( ( X i^i Y ) .+ ( X i^i Z ) ) = ( ( ( X i^i Z ) .+ Y ) i^i X ) ) |
| 27 | 4, 13, 26 | #P_3eqtr4a | |- ( ( K e. HL /\ ( X e. S /\ Y C_ A /\ Z C_ A ) ) -> ( X i^i ( Y .+ ( X i^i Z ) ) ) = ( ( X i^i Y ) .+ ( X i^i Z ) ) ) |
